item.description: Will Monday will be nice? Waterskiers!!! come over and meet everyone at Peter's house around 3PM....bring some snack stuff, drinks, etc. a great opportunity to see some Waterski Enthusiasts before the season is over. We may go for a cruise on the Charles before the sun goes down. The hurricane should be gone. Looks like Monday will be nice. Thanks! if you have any questiions, call peter 617 633 6187
item.how_to_find_us: Call my mobile if you do not see me.
item.why: We want to celebrate. Maybe we can do a raft up?
item.name: Labor Day Social
